text: Hey {name}, This is {company_name}. Just a reminder your certificate {certificate_name}, certificate number: {certificate_number} completed on {completion_date} will be {certificate_msg} on {expiration_date}. Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions.

email.subject: Certificate {certificate_name} upcoming expiration
email.body:
Hey {name},

This is {company_name}. Just a reminder your certificate {certificate_name}, certificate number: {certificate_number} completed on {completion_date} will be {certificate_msg} on {expiration_date}. Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions.Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
